lead_paragraph: Bank shares were climbing, too, and consumer stocks received a lift from strong fourth-quarter results from companies like Procter & Gamble and Coach.

headline.print_headline: As the Price of Oil Climbs Higher, the Broader Market Follows
headline.main: As the Price of Oil Climbs Higher, the Broader Market Follows

snippet: Bank shares were climbing, too, and consumer stocks received a lift from strong fourth-quarter results from companies like Procter & Gamble and Coach.
abstract: Stocks rise as price of oil rises almost 4 percent, day after falling sharply.
